website_summaries.verdict: Very comfortable shoes, with a sole that holds up to spins, slides, and skips.
pros: Buttery soft leather, with little need to break in material
Synthetic sole provides coverage all the way to the toe for confident spins
cons: Wide feet may find shoes too tight, though going up a half size may solve it
Soles tend to wear through within a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Only order .5 size up.
customer_reviews.text: The leather these shoes are made of is buttery soft and wonderful! The only issue is that after following other reviewer's advice, I ordered 1 street size up from my normal size. That was a mistake, I should have only ordered .5 size up. They are a little baggy and just a smidge too big, as seen in the pic attached. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: lightsyouonfire

customer_reviews.title: DANCERS: order normal street size!
customer_reviews.text: I used these shoes when I had rehearsals for Cats. These shoes are really comfortable and are great quality. I ordered my street size, 9, and they fit perfect. If I had gone a size up, they would be too big. Leather stretches over time, so I don’t recommend going a size up. Just bear through it being a little snug at first and then it’ll be perfect once you break them in. If you’re a dancer, you don’t want to order a size up and risk them being too loose or baggy. If I had one complaint, it would be that the backs of the shoes dig slightly into the back of my heel. Otherwise, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: meiers

customer_reviews.title: Use the Thumb Rule
customer_reviews.text: After nervously debating back and forth between buying my daughter a size 7.5 or an 8, I decided on the 7.5. My daughter is currently wearing a 7.5 shoe. Do you remember when you use to try on shoes at the store and your mom would place her thumb sideways at the top to determine if you had room to grow? That's how my daughters tennis shoes fit. Well that's also how the jazz shoes fit. While these are more than I care to pay, they are a great shoe and our dance studio prefers Bloch. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Only style I buy BUT with Bloch, I need a whole size larger. NO support. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I line dance and these are perfect, super flexible but with that, they provide no arch support. Several of my dancers are using them too. Very comfortable, like slippers. My usual shoe size is 7 and I buy 8 to wear without a sock. I always add a memory foam insert for a bit of cushion too.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: I love these dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these dance shoes! They are comfortable and fit perfectly. I already had a black pair and ordered these so I had a back-up. I use them for Latin dance lessons and even wear them to our socials and out dancing. Way better than heel for my back and knees.
customer_reviews.author: AcctgDiva365

customer_reviews.title: They run a little small
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes and the quality seems good but I had to exchange these for a bigger size. Since they only come in whole sizes, I ordered a 9. I normally wear an 81/2 in street shoes but they were too small. I exchanged them for a 10 and they fit great. They are slightly loose but its not a problem. They're comfortable but I would recommend buying at least a whole size larger than you're normal street shoes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible...perfect for jazz dance classes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for jazz dance class and ordered 2 different sizes based on the reviews. I kept the ones that were the same as my street shoe size. They fit snuggly which is how I like my dance shoes. The shoe material is very soft and flexible for dancing and I would definitely not recommend these for anything other than dance as the sole is thin and flexible for dance with only a moderate amount of arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Chancey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bloch shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe Bloch shoe is just as described and fit as should. My daughter is a size 8 with a wide box toe and the 8 fit perfect. Received a day early so that is an added bonus. I am a dance studio owner and have sold retail dancewear in the past. These are just as should be order your street shoe size. Remember dance shoes should fit snug to allow for the leather to form to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these shoes. She had been using the same pair she had from high school for many years so I decided to get her some new ones for Christmas. The shoes are very durable and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to street shoe size....but Expensive!
customer_reviews.text: They are good, I thought they would be a bit big...daughter wears an 8.5 and I ordered a 9, but they are great...left her a bit of room to grow. So fits pretty true to size. I would give a higher rating..but they are expensive for things that wear out quickly. $20, or $25 should be a better price...they just keep creeping the price up on these puppies....they are all shoes that do not last...just part of their sport. So I would give 5 stars if they would get the price down.
customer_reviews.author: lew

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes for dance
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for dance. Since they are soft leather like a ballet shoe they are designed to fit more snugly than regular shoes. I did order a half size larger than my regular shoes based on other reviews and that was perfect. It is amazing that such a soft flexible shoe can have such nice arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well-made shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the stretchy material being the center rather than the sides. My instep is high/big ( not sure the right word) and my feet a little wide, so it is nice these accommodate that. I tried the style with two side stretchy bits that didn't work well. I bought a size seven, and I wear a 6.5 or 7 in street shoes normally. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra A

customer_reviews.title: Great jazz shoe, use size guide!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought/worn jazz shoes before and did some reading before settling on a size. I used the size guide and went with a size 8.5 (my street shoe size is 8) and it was the right call. Snug but not tight with room but not loose.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. We ordered a size 4 as my daughter wears size 4 and her normal size is a little big. These shoes are a whole size smaller. The quality is good though. We will be exchanging for a size 5.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear as house shoes and I love them! My mom tried mine on and fell in love also, so she then ordered her own pair. For mine I ordered a half size up from my street shoe. They're not tight around the foot in any way, but due to the elastic in the tongue area they stay on and have no fear of slipping off of the foot. I love these so much! They make me dance around my house. I love the split sole too. I'm constantly bending my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lia M.

customer_reviews.title: Mis-representation of what was actually shipped!  Horrible Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible purchase. The shoes were not leather and looked like someone slapped some rough material together to form a shoe. Added a heal and the foot pad area. Inside the shoe, you could feel the foot pad area which would have dug into my daughters foot. How on earth one can ship you something like this is beyond me. What a waste of time. I went to a store and ordered and was happy to pay more money to get what I thought I originally ordered. If you received what was pictured and described then consider yourself lucky. I don't normally leave reviews but this was very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: DJamesMom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable, love this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis on both feet and needed something to wear that looks professional and would also not require me wearing arch support bands. Decided to give these a try just based on the pic, which I don’t generally do. Arch support is perfect for me. I know these are used for dancing but I use just for the comfort. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe, good price & Prime
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe for a good price and arrived in 2 days on prime. I ordered about 1/2 size up from street shoe since jazz shoes usually run tight, my daughter wears 7 1/2-8, so I ordered the 8. Fit great! Put them on and ready to go, performed in them already and worked as expected. So happy to find this shoe/brand on Amazon prime for a quick order with no additional shipping fees!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from my dancer. Used them for a year. Even needed a second pair, but a second pair from this provider wouldn't be available soon enough. My girl said she liked these better than the Payless ones... when they were still in business.
customer_reviews.author: Onit

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter says these jazz shoes are very comfortable. She wears street shoe size 7. We ordered both 6.5 and 7 in these. She’s wearing 6.5 now. Decided to keep the 7’s since she’s still growing. Can’t attest to durability yet, as she’s only been using them for 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Do not order street shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my street shoe size against my better judgment on the Bloch jazz shoes I already have which are bigger, and they were tight, not "danceable". I bought my other pair years ago and thought maybe the sizing had changed, but nope! The shoe itself is beautiful and does fit like a glove though.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and a PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so uncomfortable. Too skinny through the toes, and big around the heels of the foot. Everyone on the color guard team complains about the heel and how uncomfortable they are. One girls' had holes in it after a week of wearing. We will be buying Bloch's other model, which is MUCH BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo Slice

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out, sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Block dance shoes are well made and perfect for our daughters dance. However, sizing is terrible. I have ordered this shoe twice both times I have received shoes that do not fit our daughter. Wish we could get the right size :(. We are left searching for right sizing instructions for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jazz Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old daughter to wear for her play. She normally wears a size 4.5 in girls shoes, so I bought her these jazz shoes in a women’s 6.5. There is still a little room to grow plus she has very narrow feet, so these are a little wrinkly on her. However, we are happy with these beautiful shoes and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: awolfie1

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather and stretchy material for comfort. Regular dress shoe size is 8, and size 8.5 for Nike sneakers. In this jazz shoe, 8.5 fits perfectly. Not the best price but good quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperLiz

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: We should’ve stuck with street size. Instead we went up one whole size and although it’s ok-ish, it would’ve looked and worked better being fitted. They look a little sloppy right now, but my daughter’s feet is still growing and she won’t be using them until February so I’m keeping them and hopefully they will fit a bit better then. Other wise great jazz shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BallerinaMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Arch Support!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using a different brand of jazz shoe for years and when I went to order a bigger size I accidentally ordered these. Best oops I ever made according to her. The arch support is fantastic. It really enables her to get clean lines. They are very comfortable and weren’t too slippery as some new jazz shoes tend to be. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Momma K

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I went with these! The soles give a bit more coverage, instead of missing the tips of the toes and just covering the balls of the foot and heel! They fit well, but I went a half size larger, just in case. Next time, I'll stick with my regular size. I think they're true to size and not as small running as some of the comments make them seem. I wear them bare footed, though... maybe that's why. Overall, a great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Gwin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and color.
customer_reviews.text: These feel great on my feet. Just enough room so that I’m comfortable doing my turns. I even have room to wear socks. And these were a bargain. Said they were used and scratched, but they looked brand new other than a severely damaged box. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Voluptuouslyskinny

customer_reviews.title: Like the feel, but size is a tad small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel, but I wear a size 9 in most all sockless shoes, and these are just a tad too tight even after 30 hours of wear. My daughter said these would stretch, but the right foot never really has, which is weird because my left foot is the larger foot. Time to order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: sunnygale

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: Runs small but not a big deal great company did exchange effortlessly and already have new ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bolton

customer_reviews.title: For a snug fit, a half size smaller should do it
customer_reviews.text: I had an old worn out pair that I wanted to replace and ordered a size bigger to accommodate my height arch. I like them overall, but they’re a little wide even though the elastic is very tight. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: I. Pal

customer_reviews.title: I received soiled used shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I purchased a half size up and the fit was fine. The leather is butter soft and light weight! Cons: The packaging was bad. The box was crushed and the front of each shoe was dirty. There was a slight wear pattern on the bottom of each shoe and the insides were soiled. I got the impression the shoes were used and then returned. Disappointed, because the shoes are well made, but I won't spend $40 on used shoes. Must return.
customer_reviews.author: andy cc

customer_reviews.title: My dancing queen loves her jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: We struggled to find shoes that fit...but we managed to find these. The deal is...every single shoe my daughter wears is a different size, so I can't honestly say these were "as expected" because it took me 3 pairs to find the right fit. However, they are larger than most of her street shoes, but not all of them. So..as vague as this information it...I'm just saying not to be too shocked if they don't fit right. These shoes really need to be tried on. However, next time we order them, we know where are starting point is and can just get the next size up. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and color. My teen daughter used these for competitive cheer. They worked very well, very comfortable and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaAnn

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these comfortable shoes! I frequently use these when I go out social dancing as a super comfortable alternative to wearing heels! To "jazz" them up a little, I sewed Swarovski crystals around the elastic gusset, and I dance in sparkly comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ECT

customer_reviews.title: We like the Bloch brand because the sizing seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: These are typical jazz shoes. My 10 year old wears them for dance class and they have held up very well. These are her second pair as she outgrew the first pair. We like the Bloch brand because the sizing seems to be closer to what we are used to. We order one to one and a half sizes larger than her "street" shoes. This has been consistent for all of the Bloch dance shoes that we've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFourinFFX

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: I did order a 1/2 size larger and it works for me. however, the shoe wasn't that comfortable after wearing for a while in my dance class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe works for me. Quality is great, as expected. I order a half size up from my true shoe size and the fit is just a little more snug that expected, but I tend to like that. If you don't prefer a very snug fit in a jazz shoe, I'd go a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a dancer, but like the comfort of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like walking without shoes. However, that is not always acceptable or appropriate. These give me the comfort a feel of walking in my bare feet. I like them and wear them with casual clothes and they look cute.
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is perfect
customer_reviews.text: We tried buying another brand, but the sizing was way off. Decided to try these and they fit absolutely perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Milhorn

customer_reviews.title: Not the same shoe
customer_reviews.text: The product I got was not the one that was pictured nor what I was expecting. This particular one that I got was very tight. I know they stretch, but I only ordered a half size up (a full size would have been more appropriate). The shoe itself is fine I just ordered this one because of the elastic on the top and that's not what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: growing pains
customer_reviews.text: i'm hoping this is the last one i have to buy for kid... it's not cheap but the best jazz shoes
customer_reviews.author: The Mom

customer_reviews.title: After dinner dancing here I come
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is really comfortable and flexible. The material is well stitched and does not feel flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley-Ann LS

customer_reviews.title: Right foot only
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes and ordered another pair a year ago. I just find out that i could not use them because they both are for the right foot 😣. Be sure to exam them when they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these with the recommendation from my daughters jazz teacher after the inner sole of a pair of the theatrical brand started to separate in less than 2 months of wear. My daughter wears a grade school size 4 in tennis shoes ordered a 5.5 in this shoe and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazommy

customer_reviews.title: The left one feels much smaller, but it might ...
customer_reviews.text: The left one feels much smaller, but it might just be my feet! I have to really pull hard to get my foot in....the right one is tight but I don’t need to struggle as hard to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Prizer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Great jazz shoes for dance class. If you aren’t sure of your size, go get yourself fitted at a dance supply store. The sizes can range. These however I found to be true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Healer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes these shoes. They have more arch support and heel than she's used to wearing for dance, but she says they're very comfortable and they don't hurt her feet. She dances twice a week for an hour each time, so I hope they hold up. So far they're doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this brand and her studio doesn’t carry them. We live in a small town in Alaska and don’t have any other dance stores... extremely grateful for Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lamay Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jazz Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10tear old and the 5 in Women’s is really about 2-3 kids size. I recently had a 4 that fit a friend’s daughter who wears a 1-1 1/2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Annie T.

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel great, the stitching feels pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, the ones (different brand) we had ordered through her dance studio didn't last a full school year, come recital time we had to order these. They look and feel great, the stitching feels pretty solid, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: bevperu

customer_reviews.title: Dancing Shoes :)
customer_reviews.text: Another pair of dance shoes for my dancer :) came in great time and look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Great Movie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got several pair over the years of dance good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: For some reason these really hurt the balls of my ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these really hurt the balls of my feet. I do swing dancing and am often on the balls of my feet. I've been dancing in toms with suede in the bottom and those I never had a problem with. Perhaps I ordered the wrong shoe for the dance ): As for fit as other reviewers have mentioned these fit small so order a half size up
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: These run smaller than actual size
customer_reviews.text: These run smaller than actual size I wear an 8 so I purchased and 8 and it was way too small and way too narrow. I was very disappointed because it is a very nice jazz dance shoe but they run small and way too narrow. I was very disappointed because it is a very nice jazz dance shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for higher arch.
customer_reviews.text: Good for my dancer with a higher box/arch. The ones with the side elastics aren’t good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I bought these shoes for my daughter for attending her ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter for attending her Jazz class. She has very tiny feet, however the 6.5 size was a bit small where she could have used a size 7. We did not have time to exchange the shoes due to the fact we ordered right before her class started. The quality is okay for the price. If you are looking for a high quality dance shoe then you should purchase else where.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small half size
customer_reviews.text: Run small order half size up but once they fit they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rosemarie fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Still gave them a 4 star because the quality seemed to be as good as before
customer_reviews.text: Previously wore size 11, but seemed too tight across toes, so ordered 11.5. The new ones seemed to be at least 1.5 sizes larger rather than just a half size larger. Returned them. Still gave them a 4 star because the quality seemed to be as good as before.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes! She wanted jazz shoes that flex in the center. They are high quality and her third pair of Bloch shoes(first two were tap). Don’t buy them unless you plan on purchasing them again in the future because my daughter will not wear anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for dance or baton, gymnastics. Flexible and comfortable fit. We would buy again and recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: H. Somers

customer_reviews.title: Good service and quality
customer_reviews.text: it was a little smaller as regular size for my daughter, lager replacement was really quick. And my daughter is satisfied forbthe quality as well, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was the best price that I found for these shoes (compared to dance sites and my closest dance store is 40 minutes away). They fit as expected. I just wish they lasted longer (wore better). I am replacing these shoes every few months. The blow out of the bottom (seams) or the toes so quickly, however they do get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, broke in well after a couple hours of dance practice. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R

customer_reviews.title: Style didn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: The shoe quality looks good but this style did not fit my daughter comfortably around the arch. We are returning them and ended buying shoes from Payless that were less expensive, especially with BOGO. We bought a style with the elastic on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoe for the money. i ordered them snug and they have broken in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: morgancombs

customer_reviews.title: run small
customer_reviews.text: I wear street size 6 and ended up with 7.5. (The 6.5 and 7 seemed to be the exact same size though). After finally getting the right size, I love them! They are so comfortable and supportive to dance in.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: We tried three different styles and these were the best fit for my daughter's long/skinny feet.
customer_reviews.author: M Champion

customer_reviews.title: size up
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is size 8.5 but the 8.5 is too tight . size 9 is perfect though
customer_reviews.author: wenger

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted less than a week. I couldn't even get through a performance before before they started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: sbk

customer_reviews.title: Old reliable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has owned several of these over the years. Nothing but good things to say. Comfortable, reliably sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: So convenient buying the shoes for my daughter! Just as depicted. Great fit. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box was crunched but the shoe was perfect! Thanks so much. I wished I ordered two!
customer_reviews.author: Janet  A

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic jazz shoes, soft and breathable. Fits as expected. I meaured my daughters foot and got her 5, her street shoe is 3-3.5. It fit perfectly with little room for growth
customer_reviews.author: Elvira LeNoir

customer_reviews.title: Dance
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and fit exactly as needed. Great condition and color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes: I can spin like nobody's business! I bought my street size and they fit like a glove. My only issue is that the left heel feels a little wonky, which really is not much of a problem since I dance Salsa and Bachata so I don't use the heel except for walking on and off the dance floor, and it may work itself out as I wear them more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Typical jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're typical jazz shoes, fit as expected. I will say that my daughter usually has to buy wide width and these still fit her well even though they say "medium," so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go to Dance Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Tried and true dance shoes for my daughter. She has been wearing them for years. With as much as she practices they only last for one season, but probably none of them do.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great. Cute dance shoe.
customer_reviews.text: As the previous reviews said buy a half size up n it fit perfect then. They are very cute and great for dancing on floors that are not the greatest and makes turning easier in those situations.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley W

customer_reviews.title: great look. Do not hold up very well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as listed, great look. Do not hold up very well as we've had two pairs and neither pair seemed to hold together after 3 months of normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: natasha ormsby

customer_reviews.title: these are THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd pair of these, I dance every week a few times, these are my favorite shoes for really moving around the dance floor. we are doing co-creative partner dancing and I move quite a lot these never come loose or off, they do NOT slide (unless I want to) and they NEVER hurt my feet at all. they look pretty snazzy too (O:
customer_reviews.author: ampm247

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable! I normally wear 7.5, ordered 8, fit perfectly. Bought two pairs! Especially like the bottom of the shoes cover all the way to the toe parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PUT YOUR DANCING SHOES ON!
customer_reviews.text: I answered "No" on the question about arch support because I have no arches. I think the reason why the Bloch Super Jazz Shoe was uncomfortable after a couple of hours is because it was my literal 1st time wearing them & I had to dance in them throughout the day. I believe they just need to be 'broken in'. Overall, I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: DanaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes for the price. Elastic on top rather than on the side of the shoes makes them much easier to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!  Fits as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for her Show Choir practices an performances. She is quite tall and wears a size 10 shoe. She loves these and finds them so comfortable, she does not want to take them off after practice! She wear them with the nude Bloch Convertible Tights.
customer_reviews.author: wndzbug

customer_reviews.title: Nice jazz shoes just a little big but my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jazz shoes just a little big but my daughter will grow in to them. I order a 1/2 size larger than her street shoes like most customers recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: If the Shoe Fits, Wear It!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit of the shoe best. It is comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Comfortable but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Run somewhat small but they are so soft and comfortable. I am between sizes 8 & 8.5. I brought size 8.5 but would buy size 9 next time.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these are the real things
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wearing these for several years and I've purchased them from Amazon before. The pair I just purchased were a much harder leather and so narrow that my daughter could not get her foot into the shoe. I thought it may be because we bought black instead of tan but the pair I bought at the dance store fit perfect. Sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for stage!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I perform at my school where it isn't allowed to barefoot on the stage. These shoes feel great and are perfect for performing in musicals with decently difficult choreography. (I am not a serious dancer)
customer_reviews.author: Jen from NM

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed black jazz shoes for dance class, and I could only find pink in the local shops, so I ordered these. I saw in most of the reviews that they ran a little small, so I ordered a half size larger than her street shoe size, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ARHouston

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: this type of shoe has no standard size but reviews said to buy half a size larger. so mine are too big and I am waiting to see if I can exchange The return request did not offer exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Chris 's opinion

customer_reviews.title: Bloch is a superior company for dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter. Of course, Bloch is a superior company for dance shoes, and I would have expected nothing less than the best from them. I was not disappointed. What REALLY counts, of course, is the SHE LOVES THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect and held up very well throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Hartz

customer_reviews.title: They are great and easy to carry in my purse
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair. I use them for line dancing. They are great and easy to carry in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy with them and they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.V

customer_reviews.title: I followed the sizing recommendation and they fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter that is away at college. I followed the sizing recommendation and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: kleiweke

customer_reviews.title: returning. bought a size big, but still not ...
customer_reviews.text: returning. bought a size big, but still not wearable. needs to state to buy 2 sizes larger than street shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: H. Detherow

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: For never having jazz shoes before, I can say I love how these fit, didn’t feel like I was wearing shoes!
customer_reviews.author: MrSyDuck

product_meta.title: Bloch Dance Women's Super Jazz Leather and Elastic Slip On Jazz Shoe
product_meta.description:
Dancers know that a sharp focus is essential to a flawless performance--which is why we adore this women's Super jazz shoe by Bloch. Reliable in every way so you can focus on what's important, the soft leather shoe sports a pull-on elasticized instep panel, traction rubber split sole and utterly freeform profile that fits like a glove. Gently lined to protect your heel from rubbing and chafing, it's one smart step on your way to Broadway.

Founded in Sydney, in 1932 by Jacob Bloch, Bloch is a pioneer in the technical dance market. Since its inception, the renowned footwear brand has produced handmade pointe shoes for esteemed ballet dancers worldwide. Bloch recently entered an exciting new period of innovation and fashion design with the creation of mainstream footwear, following the demands by current customers to create street-ready shoes.
feature_bullets: Full grain soft leather upper and strong elastic top piece for quick, easy changes
100% cotton lining helps shoe to breathe
Rubber split sole; EVA outsole is light, durable and flexible providing balance between slide and grip
Sizing: Start with same as street shoe to 1/2 size up
